resources.string: Privacy and security, crafted for your mobile device, usable by everyone.
Let\'s set up your device in a few steps.
Let\'s set up your user profile in a few steps.
Allow apps that have asked your permission to use your location information. This may include your current location and past locations.
If you have a backup from you last GrapheneOS device, you can restore it here.
You\'re ready to start using your device
You\'re ready to start using your user profile
Set up a secondary unlock method
Set your time zone and adjust current date and time if needed
Learn gestures to go home, go back and switch between apps
The bootloader is unlocked and software integrity can not be guaranteed. Any data stored on this device may be available to attackers. Do not store any sensitive data on this device.
Visit this link on another device:

The bootloader is unlocked and software integrity can not be guaranteed. Any data stored on this device may be available to attackers. Do not store any sensitive data on this device.

Locking the bootloader at a later stage will wipe all the data on this device. To keep the data safe and secure we advice you to lock the bootloader before setting up the device.

To lock your bootloader, visit the link below on another device for instructions and then press "Reboot to bootloader":
I understand the security risks of not locking my bootloader.
It\'s recommended to disable OEM unlocking to improve device security
